answers.answer: Since you waited so long (No hate here, I understand! I don't agree, but I understand!) it's possible that whatever damage occurred has healed incorrectly, which could be what's causing the continued discomfort.Are you able to flex and extend your hand normally, or is there limited range of motion in that joint?I'm glad you're going to get it looked at. Hopefully it can be fixed!

Oh, one more thing...if and when you go for surgery, make sure you are operated on by an *orthopedic surgeon* who specializes in hand issues and ONLY hand issues. You'll likely get a better outcome. Good luck!
